pageContext.claim: “The new Fake News narrative is that there is CHAOS in the White House. Wrong! People will always come & go, and I want strong dialogue before making a final decision. I still have some people that I want to change (always seeking perfection). There is no Chaos, only great Energy!”
pageContext.analysis: Every president loses staff during their first year in office, but President Trump has seen a turnover in staff at an unprecedented rate. According to a Brookings analysis, more than a third of White House staff left or changed positions during the administration's first year. Ronald Reagan, who previously had the highest rate of turnover, saw half of the turnover that the Trump administration has seen. The president regularly contradicts staff and changes his positions.
